info.description:
HTTP API for transcoding media files into different formats using pluggable
providers.

h2:Currently supported providers

b: [Amazon Elastic Transcoder](https://aws.amazon.com/elastictranscoder/)
b: [Elemental Conductor](https://www.elementaltechnologies.com/products/elemental-conductor)
b: [Encoding.com](http://api.encoding.com)
info.title: video-transcoding-api

get.summary: List available presets on the API.

Job.description:
Job represents the job that is persisted in the repository of the Transcoding
API.

Preset.description:
Each preset is just an aggregator of provider presets, where each preset in
the API maps to a preset on each provider
Preset.title:
Preset represents the preset that is persisted in the repository of the
Transcoding API

providerMapping.description: mapping of provider name to provider's internal preset id.
